query: UPDATE ingredients SET unit = 2, costPerUnit = 1.20 WHERE name LIKE '%Scallops%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute UPDATE ingredients SET unit = 2, costPerUnit = 1.20 WHERE name LIKE '%Scallops%'
